title: "Can Artificial Intelligence Enable Machines with Fluid Intelligence?"
excerpt: "A novel class of artificial intelligence (AI) machine learning will be unveiled at the upcoming Thirty-Fifth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence in early February 2021. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and Austrian researchers have created a new neural network endowed with increased fluid artificial intelligence called “liquid” machine learning."
